Data Fields

s16 scrollX

Detailed Description

Map type.

Once created, you can change the map contents to make it scroll for example.

Field Documentation

s16 UL_MAP::scrollX

Current horizontal scrolling value in pixels.

s16 UL_MAP::scrollY

Current vertical scrolling value in pixels.
